DOC.brief_summary: This study has two main goals : - to investigate the impact of aging on cortical excitability (CE) - to investigate the impact of "state dependency" on CE, using a cognitive task and an emotional one. A Neuronavigation system of transcranial magnetic stimulation is used, and electromyographic response are recorded.
DOC.brief_title: Cortical Excitability Using Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation and Neuronavigation Device
DOC.criteria: male or female age 1875 signed informed consent normal physical examination less 18 or more 75 years of age contra indication to TMS: epilepsia or seizures, metallic head devices, cardiac pacemaker, pregnancy, jet lag or severe insomnia the night before severe physical disease treatment with psychotropic drugs overt psychiatric disease alcohol consumption before the examination
